definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
people are in a terrible situation (idiom)
the common people in a miserable state

sentences.english: War broke out again, plunging the people into misery and suffering.
Since World War II, the Middle East region has been plagued by incessant wars and conflicts. Numerous lives have been lost and many innocent people displaced.
sentences.chinese: 二戰以來，中東戰火不斷，生靈塗炭，百姓流離失所。

sentences.english: Behind the curtains of joyful celebration, many beings today are executed mercilessly.
sentences.chinese: 無數生靈在今天慘遭塗炭，被無情地判處死刑。
